177b6('dul ba): sras kyis dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir 'gyid ngam/ 'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag
177b7('dul ba): gir mi bgyid ces mchis de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shA kyi sras kyi dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do// zhes mchis
177b8('dul ba): kha cig ni skad ces dge sbyongs rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do// zhes mchi'i ni/ btsun pa de la ga
178a1('dul ba): 'dul ba#/ ngag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan rung zhing shAkyi'i sras kyis dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir bgyid do// zhes mchin/ btsun pa gang ga de skad mtshig
178a2('dul ba): de dag de ltar brda' sprod par bgyid pa na bcom ldan 'das la bskur pa 'debs par mi bgyid cing gcang thal bar yang mi bgying ba dang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes chos dang
178a3('dul ba): chos smra ba dang / chos kyis rje su mthun pa'i chos brda' spong bar bgyid pa dang gsungs pa'i rjes smra ba de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'ga' mi mchi ba
178a4('dul ba): lags sam/ grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyongs rnam la gser bdag gir byed do// zhes zer ba deg de ltar bda' sprod par
178a5('dul ba): byed pa na/ nga la bskur pa 'debs par byed cing ha cang thal bar byed pa dang de dag ngas smras pa'i rjes su smra ba yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin pa dang chos kyis rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyis rje su mthun pa'i
178a6('dul ba): chos rnga sprod pa ma yin pa dang smras pa'i rjes smra ba yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu chos bzhin du 'ongs pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong dpon dge slong
178a7('dul ba): rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de gang la la lam mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gi byed pa de ni dge sbyongs
178a8('dul ba): chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyis chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro// grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid kyis phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyis bar du brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams mngon
178b1('dul ba): mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gi mi byed dam/ gang la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin ning de ni 'argya
178b2('dul ba): sras kyi chos ma yin no// btsun pa gang gi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi gyi
178b3('dul ba): de gang la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma lag shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lag so// zhes bka' stsal to// ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das
178b4('dul ba): kyi legs par gsung ba'i ni ngo mtshar to// btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces grong dpon ngas khyod la don de nyid lan gsum gyi bar du rjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la
178b5('dul ba): mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyongs rnams la gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyongs gsi
178b6('dul ba): chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyis chos ma lag sa zhes bka' stsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ni rgya cher bzang ba lags so// btsun pa bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid do// dge slong
178b7('dul ba): rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon
178b8('dul ba): tan lnga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lags so// grong dpon de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ dge slong rnam la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge slong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed
179a1('dul ba): 'dul ba / gang la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyis chos ma yin no// de nis grong dpon
179a2('dul ba): gtsug na nor bus la bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba la/ mngon par dga' ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zas phyag 'tshal te/
179a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs na 'dug par gyur cing gsil yab thogs te bcom ldan
179a4('dul ba): 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong dpon gtsug na nor bu song nas ring po ma lon pa thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
179a5('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo song la 'od ma'i tshal ka lan 'da' ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad dpong si'i khang par sdus cing / tshe dang ldan pa kun
179a6('dul ba): dga' bos btsun pa bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'od ma'i 'tshal ka lan 'da' ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams
179a7('dul ba): cad dpong sa'i khang par sdus nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te mtha' cig tu 'dug go// mthab cig tu 'dug
179a8('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'od ma'i 'tshal ka lan 'da' ka'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa
179b1('dul ba): de dag thams cad dpong sa'i khang par mchis zhing mthun par gyur na bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpod
179b2('dul ba): sa'i khang pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gong du bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam
179b3('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gtsug dag da nI da pong gtsug na nor bu ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' cig tu 'dugo// mtha' cig tu
179b4('dul ba): 'dug nas ngal grong dpon gtsug na nor bu 'di skad ces btsun pa mngon gyi gdug rnams kyis ches snga ma zhig la rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po dang blon po'i 'khor mchis shing
179b5('dul ba): mthun par gyur pa rnams la bar skabs kyi bka' mchis kun du brjod pa pa 'di lta bu 'di 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shes ldan dag ci dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can
179b6('dul ba): rung ngam/ shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir bgyid dam/ 'on te dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser
179b7('dul ba): bdag gi mi bgyid ces mchi nas/ de na kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la gser bdog gir bgyid
179b8('dul ba): zhes mchi/ kha cig ni 'di skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi 'gyid do zhes mchi na/ btsun
180a1('dul ba): 'dul ba @#pa de la gang dag de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan rung zhing shAkyi'i dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid do zhes mchi na/ btsun pa ji
180a2('dul ba): bre/ lhar gang dag de skad mchi ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par bgyid pa na bcom ldan 'das la bskur bar 'debs mi bgyid cing ha cang thal bar yang mi bgyid pa dang / de dag
180a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang chos kyis rjes su mthun pa'i chos bde sprod par bgyid pa dang / gsungs pa'i rjesu smra ba de dag la gzhan
180a4('dul ba): las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos dga' yang mi mchi ba lags sam zhes zer nas/ ngas de la 'di skad ces grong dpon gang dag de skad ces dge slong
180a5('dul ba): rnams la mngon mtshan can rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir byed do// zhes zer ba de dag de ltar brda sprod par byed pa na nga la bskur ba 'debs pa
180a6('dul ba): byed cing ha cang mthal bar byed pa dang de dag ngas smras pa'i rjesu smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyis rjes su mthun pa'i chos brda sprod par byed pa ma
180a7('dul ba): yin pa dang smras pa'i rjesu smra ba ma yin pa de dag la gzhan las chos dang mthun pas smad pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos shin tu 'ongs pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong dpon dge
180a8('dul ba): slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge slong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag byed pa de
180b1('dul ba): ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyis chos ma yin pa'i phyir ro// grong dpon ngas khyed la don de nyid kyis phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyis bar du brjod
180b2('dul ba): par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing
180b3('dul ba): gser bdag gi byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras pa dang / de la nga 'di skad ces btsun pa gang gi slad bcom
180b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan
180b5('dul ba): can rung shing gser bdag gir 'byid pa de ni dge slong gis chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyis tshes ma yin lags so// zhes bka' stsol to// ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das
180b6('dul ba): kyi legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar ro// btsun pa gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces grong dpon khyod la don de nyid kyi phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du
180b7('dul ba): brjod par bya ste/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i dge sbyongs rnams gser bdag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag
180b8('dul ba): gir bgyid pa de ni dge sbyongs gi chos ma lags shing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma lag so zhes bka' stsal pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' de ni rgya cher bzang ba lags so//
181a1('dul ba): 'dul ba #/ btsun pa bdag kyang 'di snyam bgyid de dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams bla dag gir mi bgyid de/ gang la mngon
181a2('dul ba): mtshan can rung zhing gser bdag gir bgyid pa/ de la ni 'don pa'i yon tan snga po dag kyang rung ba kho na lag so// zhes zer ro// ngas de la 'di skad ces grong dpon de de bzhin no// de de
181a3('dul ba): bzhin te/ dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing gser bdag
181a4('dul ba): gar byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras so// de nas grong dpon gtsug na nor bus de ngas smras pa la mngon par dga' ba dang
181a5('dul ba): rje su yi rang bar byas nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te nga'i drung nas song ngo // dge slong dag de ltar grong dpon gtsug na nor bus des rgyal po dang bcas pa'i
181a6('dul ba): 'khor gyis mdun du dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan can mi rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir mi byed de/ gang la la la mngon mtshan can rung zhing
181a7('dul ba): gser bdag gir byed pa de la ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang gdon mi za bar rung ba yin no// zhes tshi gcig bzung ste khyu mchog gi tshig rgya chen po smras shing 'khor gyis
181a8('dul ba): nang du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrog so// dge slong dgangs kyang de skad ces dge slong rnams la mngon mtshan cani rung zhing shAkya'i sras kyis dge sbyong rnams gser bdag gir
181b1('dul ba): mi byed de/ gang la la lo mngon mtshan nA mi rung zhing gser bdag gir byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos ma yin zhing de ni shAkya'i sras kyi chos ma yin no zhes smras so// dge slong dag
181b2('dul ba): de lta bas na khyed kyis de deng phyin bcad shing 'dod pa dag gi shing yongasu stsal bar bya/ rtswa 'dong ba dag gi rtsa/ shing rta'i las 'dod pa dag gi ni shing rti'i las/ mi slas 'dod
181b3('dul ba): pa dag gis mi blas yongasu btsal bar bya zhes smra ba'i 'di skad ces rnam grangs gang gis kyang gser bdag gir bya ba mi smra'o// 'di ni re zhig byung ba yin gyis/ sangs rgyas
181b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi cha bar mdzad do// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gnyen yod na rgyal byed kyi
181b5('dul ba): 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag rang gis lag gis gser dang dngul dang len par byed len du 'jud par byed phung
181b6('dul ba): bo cig tu byed/ phung po gnyis su byed/ khri dang khri'u chung ngu dag tu 'jog par byas nas/ gzhan du mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag ni ma log pa ma
181b7('dul ba): grangs so ser ma spangs pa yin te 'di ltar rang gis lag gi gser dngul len par byed len du 'jud par byed/ phung po cig tu byed/ phung po gnyis su byed/ khri dang khri'u chung /
181b8('dul ba): du dag tu 'dzeg par byed do// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang rang gis lag gi gser dang dngul len par byed lan du 'jud par byed/ phung po cig tu byed/ phung po gnyi su byed/
182a1('dul ba): 'dul #/ khri dang khri'u dang khri'u chung ngur 'jog par byed na shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'di la bye brag ni
182a2('dul ba): / ci yod/ bsams pa ni ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka btong
182a3('dul ba): bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'byung ba 'di dang gleng bzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la
182a4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun snga ba mdzad do// zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya
182a5('dul ba): ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang gi lag gi gser dang dngul len pa
182a6('dul ba): dang lan du 'jud pa bden nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rje su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin tshul dang mthun pa
182a7('dul ba): ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par rmad par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnam la bka'
182a8('dul ba): stsal pa dge slong dag de lta bas ni phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pa 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma
182b1('dul ba): bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gi gser dang dngul lan tam lan du 'jud na spang
182b2('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed do// gang dge slong zhes bya ba na drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni rang gi lags paso// gser dang dngul bya/
182b3('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni dbyig dang gser ro// lan tam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so// lan du 'jud na zhes bya ba ni bzhan no// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs
182b4('dul ba): nas ltung byed kyi bshags par bya ste des na spangs pa'i ltung byed do zhes gsung so// de lhung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ bzhi bcwo brgyad kyis ste/ 'di long shig/ 'di nas
182b5('dul ba): long shig/ 'di tsam leng shig bya ba dang / 'di khyer shog/ 'di nas khyer shog/ 'di tsam khyer shog/ ces bya ba dang / 'di zhog shig/ 'di tsam zhogs shig/ ces bya ba
182b6('dul ba): dang 'di long shig/ de nas long shig de tsam long shig ces bya ba dang / de khyer shig/ de nas khyer shig/ de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang / de zhog shig/ der zhog shig/
182b7('dul ba): de tsam zhog shig/ 'di ces byas pas so// de la 'di long shig ces bya ba ni/ thob par gyur pa'i phyogs su dbyig gam gser 'di long shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/
182b8('dul ba): de sgo bar byed pa la nye byas su 'gyur la/ blangs na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di nas long shig ces bya ba ni theb par 'gyur ba'i phyog su bzang po che nas sam
183a1('dul ba): 'dul / zangs nas sam rdza bo nas sam/ sgom nas sam/ ko sngags nas sam za ma thags nas yongs shig ces smra bar byed pa ste/ de spro bar byed pa nyes bya
183a2('dul ba): su 'gyur/ blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di khyer shog ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyog su rgyalam stong ngam/ 'bum leng shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de
183a3('dul ba): sgo bar byed pha la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di khyer shog ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam gser 'di khyer
183a4('dul ba): shog ces sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur la khyer na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di na khyer shog ces bya ba ni thob par
183a5('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i phyogasu zangs po che nas sam/ zangs nas sam/ rdza bo nas sam/ sgom nas sam/ ko spags nas sam/ za ma tog nas khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de
183a6('dul ba): spro bar byed pa la nyes byas 'gyur la blangs pa na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni thong par 'gyur ba'i phyog su rgya'am stong ngam 'bum khyed
183a7('dul ba): zheg ces smra bar byed pa ted skye bar byeng pa la ces byas su 'gyur la khyer nablangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur/ 'dir zhog shig ces bya ba na tha par 'gyur ba'i bya su 'angs pa
183a8('dul ba): cher ram zangs su'am rdza bar ram/ skam bu'am go sngags su'am ma ma thog su nam shig ces pasgo bar byed pa ste/ spro bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhag pa na sa
183b1('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di tsam bzhog shig ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu rgya 'am stong ngam 'bum gzhog ces bya bar byed pa ste de sgo bar byed pa la nyes bya su 'gyur
183b2('dul ba): la bzhag pa na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de long shig ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam gser de long shig ces sgo bar byed pa la nye sa su 'gyur la blangs
183b3('dul ba): na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de nas long shig ces bya ba na thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su zam po che nas sam/ zangs nas sam/ rdza ba nas sam/ sgom nas sam/ ke sngags
183b4('dul ba): nas bsam za ma dog nas long shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste de skye bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de tsam longs shig ces bya ba
183b5('dul ba): ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu rgya'am sdong ngam 'bum long shig ces bya sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la/ blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de khyer shog ces bya
183b6('dul ba): ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su dbyig gam gser de khyer shog ces sgo bas sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer ba na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de nas khyer
183b7('dul ba): shog ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyog su brgya'am stong ngam 'bum lang shig ces slobs sgo bar byed pa ste de sko bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung
183b8('dul ba): byed du 'gyuraro// de nas khyer shog ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i zangs po che nas sam mang nas nas mardza ba nas sam sgom nas sam/ ko spags nas sam pa matogs nas rkye
184a1('dul ba): 'dul ba sagashos ces spro bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la blangs pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i byesas
184a2('dul ba): bya/ su rgya'am sdong ngam 'bum khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa'i ste de skye bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba ni thog
184a3('dul ba): par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu rgya 'am stong ngam 'bum khyer shog ces sgo bar byed pa'i ste de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la khyer ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// de zhog shig
184a4('dul ba): ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu gser ram dbyig de zhog shig ces sgo bar byed pa ste/ de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
184a5('dul ba): der zhog shig ces bya ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogasu zangs mo cher 'am/ zangs su 'am rdza bor ram sgrom bu 'am ko spag su 'am za ma tog su zhog shig ces sgo bar byed pa la
184a6('dul ba): nyes bya su 'gyur la gzhag pa na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de tsam gzhog shig ces bya ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyogs su brgya 'am stong ngam 'bum gnog shig ces sgo bar
184a7('dul ba): byed pa ste de sgo bar byed pa la nyes byas su 'gyur la bzhag pa na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'di long shig 'di nas long shig/ 'di tsam long shig ces bya ba dang / 'di khyer
184a8('dul ba): gcig 'di nas khyer cig ces bya ba dang / 'di zhog shig 'dir ni zhob shig 'di tsam zhog shig ces bya ba dang de long shig de nas long shig de tsam long shig ces bya ba dang / de
184b1('dul ba): khyer shog de tsam khyer shog ces bya ba dang / de zhog shig/ der zhog shig/ de tsam zhog shig ces bya ba de dag thob par gyur pa ma yin phyogasu sgo bar byed pa na de sgo bar byed
184b2('dul ba): pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro// blangs pa dang khyer ba dang bzhag pa na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong gi dbyig la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// gser la reg
184b3('dul ba): na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dbyig dang gser la reg na spangs pa'i ldang byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dbyig gam gser brdungs pa la reg na spang ba'i ljang
184b4('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro/ dbyig dang gser mngon mtshan can la reg na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dngul la reg na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// nor bu la reg na srad
184b5('dul ba): ba'i ldang byed du 'gyur ro// mu tig la reg na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro/ bai dUr+ya la reg na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// nor bu dang mu tig dang bai dUr+ya rgyal reg na
184b6('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi yul gyi mtha' snyed can gyi dbyig dang gser la reg na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// ra gan dang zangs ma dang lcags dang rno lhag
184b7('dul ba): dang ra nye dang ni nye dang khro tshul reg pa la ltung ba med de zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis slab pa'i gni bca' bar mdzad do//
184b8('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan mod na rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs// denan tsam pan khyim bdag dang pa dang ldan pa
185a1('dul ba): 'drab sam babang bdag pa'i bams pa can payang basbyin nig bdas dpa nas shegs pas mas kyang ma 'dun gyi byar dug las pas
185a2('dul ba): khabs mthon po dang skar khung dang ska rag kung dra ba can dang lan kan kyis brgyan pa'i snying dang mig phrog pa mtho ris kyis theb bkres su 'gyur ba zhig byed du bcug nas
185a3('dul ba): dge slong mang po dag dbyar gnas par khas blangs te/ de dag gi dgag dbye byas nas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag mnyan yod du ston pa dang dge slong gnas rten
185a4('dul ba): gnas rten rnams kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gros bdag cag la gos ngag byin cig/ khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di na gos bzang po dag
185a5('dul ba): mchis te/ don mthun dag mchis kyi bar du re shig dang de nas gos bzang po dang 'jal te gsol lo// de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te gos bzang po dag
185a6('dul ba): med na gos ngan pa dag byin cig/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag ni bzang po'i sbyin pa lags na ji ltar bdag gi ngan pa dag gsol bar gyis/ gal te khyed cag ring na/
185a7('dul ba): gos kyis rin kar sha ba ni dag snoms la bzhud cig/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa ni dag bklag pas bdag cag mi len to// 'phags pa dag
185a8('dul ba): 'di ltar bdag la ma byin pa ni mi dngo'i/ gos ngan pa dag byin mi rung ngo // dge slong de dag gis kar sha pa ni dag ma blangs par gos ngan pa dag ma blangs par gos
185b1('dul ba): ngan pa dag kho nas dong ste/ mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gi dbyar gnas pa'i gos
185b2('dul ba): kyis rnyed pa ma rnyed dam ci na gang gi phyir khyed cag gos dag ngan par gyur ma rnyed do// khyed cag gang du dbyar gnas par mkhas blangs tsam pa ro// khyim bdag
185b3('dul ba): gang la rten/ che go mo zhig la'o// khyim bdag de bzang mo sbyin pa zhes grag go// de ci'i phyir ma rnyed do// ci'i phyirade dag gi skabs de rgyas rjod pa dang / dge slong
185b4('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs s+ho/ kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag kyang gos kyis rin
185b5('dul ba): dag sbyin par byed la/ nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis kyang gos kyis rin dag 'dod kyis nga'i nyan thos rnams la rung bar bya ba chung zhig gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas
185b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs par bya zhing / blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid rten te bcang bar bya'o// bzhan yang dge slong gi zhal lnga byed pa
185b7('dul ba): spro bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis zhal lta byed pa gang spro bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'i ra bar 'am/ dge snyen spro bar bya ste/ kun
185b8('dul ba): dga' ra ba pa zhes pa ni rung bar byed pa'o// dge slong dag gis zhal lta byed pa gang spro bar bya ba mi shes/ dge snyen zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabasu song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga
186a1('dul ba): 'dul ba #/ bzung ba'o// dge slong dag yul gzhan du 'dong ba na de dag 'di bdag cag la sbyin bdag 'ga' yang med do zhes 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
186a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag de nyid ji srid du gson pa dang 'dug pa dang 'tsho ba dang sdod pa'i bar du shin tu ring du song yang nyams pa med do// dge slong rnams kyis chos
186a3('dul ba): gos kyi rin dag snyed la sbyin bdag med nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes ste/ mi len pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
186a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya zhing blangs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun du bagleng nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu du gsol/ bdag dge slong ming
186a5('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di byin gyi brlob po// dngos po rung ba ma
186a6('dul ba): lags 'dis dngos po rung ba sgrub par gyi'o// de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du rjod par bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis
186a7('dul ba): mtha' khob rag tu gtsug lag khang dag byed du bcug nas de na dus dang dus su smad pa dag byung nas dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang stong bar bor te byer ro// mabyin par
186a8('dul ba): lan pa dag gis btsug lag khang stong par rig nas gtsug lag khang bcom pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyis 'am mchod rten gyis dbyig
186b1('dul ba): dang gser sbas te 'gro bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sba bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sba bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
186b2('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dge snyen gyis sba bar bya'o// gang dag spad par byed pa de dag nyid rga bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge snyen dad pa can gyis sba
186b3('dul ba): bar bya'o// dge snyen dang pa tsan med na dge tshul gyis sba bar bya'o// dge tshul med na dge slong dag gi spar bya'o// de la dong rko bar bya ba yod nas gang gis brko bar bya'o// dge
186b4('dul ba): bsnyen dad pa can med na/ dge tshul gyi brko bar bya'o// dge tshul med na dge slong dag rang gi brko bar bya'o// 'jigs pa bral na rnam pa de lta bu nyid kyis phyung ste dge 'dun la 'bul
186b5('dul ba): bar bya'o// dge slong dag ngas 'phongs pa'i dus rab tu gnang ba gang yin pa de bde ba'i gnas skabs dag tu sbyang bar mi bya ste spyod na 'ga' 'tshabs can du 'gyur ro// las nga
186b6('dul ba): po ba dang smyos pa dang sems khrugs pa dang / tshor bdag gi nyan pa la ltung ba med do// gser dngul la reg pa'i spang ba ste bcwo brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho//
186b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyis 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du/
186b8('dul ba): 'byung de'i chen thams cad du yul dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ngo zhes sna grags te/ de'i nyan chos rnams 'bar ba dang gsal bdag 'char 'thang padang/
187a1('dul ba): 'dul ba lung gyu/ klog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul dag byed pas gang dag de la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag yul shin tu 'bras bu/
187a2('dul ba): / che ba dang phan yon che ba dang / gsal ba che ba dang rgyas pa che bar 'gyuraro// zhes byang lam pa'i tshong pa dag gi mthos nas de de dag smras pa/ shes ldan dag yul dbu su 'dod do//
187a3('dul ba): der khe spogs mang po yang sgrubs par bya/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la yang mchod par bya'o// zhes byang lam gi tshong ba de dge zongs thogs te yul dbus su 'phag
187a4('dul ba): nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin to// gnyen yod du shes pa can rtsis mkhan pa zhig 'dug pa des byang lam nas tsheng pa don mthun 'ongs so// zhes thos nas des bsams
187a5('dul ba): ba song sde je ltas na der chung zad thob po snyam nas/ des chung zad dmigs pas kyang shes/ chung zad rtog ges kyang shes nas der song ste ded dpon la ming dang rus nas
187a6('dul ba): brjod cing ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa lags so// 'ongs pa lag so// khyod kyis ma ni ming 'di zhes bya/ khyod kyi pha ni ming 'di zhes bya/ khyod kyis rdzas ni 'di rnyed cig 'ongaso//
187a7('dul ba): nyi ma gag mo nig la ni khal 'jig par bar 'gyur ro// khe slogs ni 'di skyed cig 'grub par 'gyur zhes smras pa dang / ded dpon des bsams pa/ som ldan 'das kyi
187a8('dul ba): nyan thos gang dag 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang 'bab pa dang klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul byed ces grags pa de dag las 'ga' zhig 'di yin gor ma chags snyams nas nges
187b1('dul ba): de la dad pas byang lam gyis nag kyis 'bras bus slong por bkang te la ba srin bu'i mdog lta bu cig kyang bskon to// shes pa can des de blangs zhing gyon te tshangs pa mtshungs
187b2('dul ba): bar spyod pa rnas kyis bam du song ba dang / de dag gi mthong nas smras pa/ shes pa can khyod kyis mgo bzlog ste nyal bgang zhig las thob/ des smras pa khyang lam nas so/
187b3('dul ba): ba den mthun 'ongs nas ded dpon la ming dang rus nas brjod nas des kho bo la dad pas dad pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no// de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag
187b4('dul ba): la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag tu khyed cag tha ga pa dang phreng rgyang dag dang 'bru mar mkhan dag las gzhan pa mi gtso bo 'ga' yang mngon par dad par mi byed do zhes mtho
187b5('dul ba): mtshams byed kyis khyod la ba 'di gyon te song la shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong de dag gi snying dgags par gyis shig/ de ltar bya'o zhes smras te/ de nas shes pa can de la bde byon
187b6('dul ba): nas rgyal byed kyis 'tshal du song ngo // drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'di bdag cag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs pa rnams la yang chos rten par bya/ rgol ba dag
187b7('dul ba): kyang cir zad par gyu rang gi zags pa yang bsgrubs par bya'i snyam pas drug snre las gang yang rung bas rdul byed kyis 'tshal byas spang bar mi 'jug pas dag
187b8('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi mtshal gyi sgon chags cig 'dug pa des shes pa can de zag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // de nas nye dga' bsams pa gcer bu pa ngan pa 'di la ba bzang po
188a1('dul ba): tsug / shi ldan pa ngasakyis rnal da sas thams da pa nas bya ma'i mang bzung ma nasadas la la pags bcan bya
188a2('dul ba): bu yin la lab 'di lta bu gyon na phyir 'babs sam gyi khob phyir ma 'bas te/ 'di ltar byung la ma nas chang bden mthun 'ongs nas/ der thabs ded dben la
188a3('dul ba): ming dang rus nas rjod nas/ des che ba la dad pas dad pa'i dbang du byas byin no// lags se ma lag so// khyod kyis rgan pa'i gnas slab su tshul khrims rgyal bkun
188a4('dul ba): tu spyad/ chur shog 'dug shig dang chos ston par bya'o// shes pa can de nyed pa'i mdun du 'dug pa dang / nye dga' ying dgal zhing yangad dga' nas de nas de la sbyin
188a5('dul ba): po ldanas pa brjed par bya'o// drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal de tshul khrims kyis tam dag byed nanyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnam du skyes/ snyam du po mo
188a6('dul ba): gal te sbyin pa'i 'dam dag byed mnyan pa po dag rang gi sha gang gin pa de yang bcad cing sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems so// gal te seng gi gtam dag byed na nyan
188a7('dul ba): pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnams skyes so snyam du sems par 'gyur ba yin pas/ nye dga' shes pa can de la smras pa/ shes pa can khyod kyis ston pa ni ngan pa la/
188a8('dul ba): mos pa yin te/ gal te de bzang por 'dong par gyur nas des khyed cag la la gos 'bum ri ba dang zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang khang ba brtsegs pa mig lnga brgya pa yang
188b1('dul ba): gnang bar 'gyur ba zhig na gnang ngo // kho bo cag gi ston pa ni bzang po la mos pa yin pas des lo ba cag gos 'bum ri ba dang zas ro brgya dang ldan pa khang pa brtsegs pa
188b2('dul ba): mig lnga brgya pa yang gnang ngo // gal te khyod la ba 'di lta bu gyon te slong mo la 'gro bar gyur na bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis shes pa can 'dis tshul khrims
188b3('dul ba): 'chal bkun spyad do snyam du shes pas khyod kyis slong mo yang mi rnyed par 'gyur gyis khyod kyil ba 'di rnyed kho bo la byin cig dang kho bos khyod la ba gzhan zhig sbyin no//
188b4('dul ba): kho bo la 'di gyon te bsod snyoms la 'jug pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis kho bo mthong nas btsun pa nye dga' la ba 'di lta bu ga las rnyed ces zer na
188b5('dul ba): kho bas de dag la 'di skad ces shes pa can che ge mo zhig gi byin no zhes brjod par bya te/ des de dag gi shes pa can dad pa dang ldan par gyur to snyam du shes par
188b6('dul ba): 'gyur zhing de dag gi khyod slong mo la zhags pa la chad dang nur rdzis slong por bkang ste sbyin par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' ba zhes shig/ nye dga'
188b7('dul ba): smras pa/ shes rab can khyod kyis tshangs batshungs par spyod pa dag ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin pas khyod de dag gi tshig thos nas/ yang phyir 'phrog tu 'ong ba
188b8('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do// btsun pa nye dga' ci kho bo la ba 'di tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa de dag dbang ba yin nam/ la ba 'di ni kho bo nyid dbang ba
189a1('dul ba): 'dul ba sam/ bgyi ba zhes bshig dang / slar thog tu mi mchig nye dga'as bde blangs nas/ bram rtsub po bzhin zhig la byin nas/ shes pa can de kla ma rtsub ma de
189a2('dul ba): / gyon na tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa rnams gi gam du phyir song ba dang / de dag gi de mthong nas smras pa/ shes pa can khyod kyis yang mgo bsgyur te nyal ba gang zhig las
189a3('dul ba): tho ba des smras pa/ 'di ni glo bzhan nas grub pa yin no// ji ltar 'gyur/ kho bo la ba de btsun pa nye dga' la byin nas des kyang kho bo la la ba 'di byin no// de dag gi spyod
189a4('dul ba): te smras pa/ shes pa can shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyongs rnams na yu cag gson pas kyang mi dga' ba yin no// drug sde dag ji lta bar gzhan de lha ma yin la nye dga' ji ltar bar
189a5('dul ba): drug sde gzhan de lta ma yin no// gal te khyod kyi dge sbyongs gnas rten gzhan 'ga' zhig la byin par gyur na kho bo cag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed khyod kyis nye dga'
189a6('dul ba): 'byin te/ de ni bdag las cang gi kyang khrag ces phyis su lan par 'dod pa yin gyis la til 'byor te 'angs na de ldan lags/ gas te khyer nyimi 'angs na chog
189a7('dul ba): cag gi khyod tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa'i nang nas gnas nas dbyung bar bya/ sngangs leb ze'u yang bar bya/ slong por yang khas dbub par bya/ khar pa yang da nga rgya
189a8('dul ba): de smad nas nye dga' gal ba der song ba dang nye dga' thag ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ shes pa can 'gros 'di lta bus 'das pa 'di ni bdas
189b1('dul ba): gis la ba 'phrog par byed pa yin no// snyam nas de btsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs nas sgo cang de 'dug go// shes pa can de sgo bdungs par brtsams brje btsun pa nye dag
189b2('dul ba): btsun pa nye dga' zhes bos pa dang / nye dga' cing mi smra bar 'dug go/ dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/ shes pa can khyod la btsun pa nye dga' ci bya/ des smras pa/ des
189b3('dul ba): kho bo'i la ba zhig khyer ro// shes pa can gal te khyod la ba 'dod na song la bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu sgrub shig/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan
189b4('dul ba): 'das kyis shes pa can de thag ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa gzigaso// gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed shes pa can thag ring po
189b5('dul ba): kho na nas 'ongs pa ltos shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 'di ni la ba'i ba'i phyir 'ongs te gal te la ba thob na de lta na legs/ gal te ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs te
189b6('dul ba): dus byed par 'gyur ro// de nas shes pa can de phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das btsun pa nye dga' bdag gis la ba 'tshal
189b7('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das 'dug la slar stsal du stsol cig/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la la bslar stsal du ma sul na 'di ltar bdag tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa'i
189b8('dul ba): nang nas gnas nas 'byung bar 'gyur srong leb khre'u yang bsgyur bar 'gyur sbong por yang khas phub par 'gyur khar ba yang bor bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
190a1('dul ba): 'bul ba / kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba la song la nye dga'i gam du song ste shes pa can gyil ba phyir byin cig/ bal te
190a2('dul ba): mi sbyin na shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod do zhes bgyi shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin
190a3('dul ba): 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ nye dga' ga la ba der song ba dang / nye dga' tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo thag ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa mthong nas
190a4('dul ba): des bsams pa/ shes pa can gyis nyo 'di lta bu khrid de 'ongs pas kho bo'i ba 'phrog par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nye dga' la 'di skad
190a5('dul ba): ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa can gyi la ba phyir byin cig/ gal te 'di'i la ba phyir ma byin na shes pa can 'di khrag tsha ba skyugs
190a6('dul ba): te dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro// zhes byung ngo // nye dga' smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ston pa'i bka' mnyan par zad kyi gzhan du ni
190a7('dul ba): smre byi bcer bu 'di khrag cha bskyugs te dus byed par 'gyur ba bas gal te shes pa can sha sti gi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing 'tshal lam 'od ma'i
190a8('dul ba): 'tshal bzhin du gang bar 'gyur la de dag thams cad khrag tsha ba skyugs de kha dag cing dus byed par gyur kyi nye dga' spu'i rtse mo tsam yang mi g.yo ste 'od kyang bzhud cig
190b1('dul ba): dang sbyin no// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang / nye dga' smras pa/ kA'i gcer bu pa nyon cig khyod kyis ston rdzun ma des rdzun du smra bas 'jig rten smras nas/ sems
190b2('dul ba): can dmyal ba rnamasu skyes te de'i lce la thong bshol lnga brgyas rmod par byed na/ khyod kyang de bas kyang brdzun ma chen po yin pas khyod kyis lce la yang mthong ba shol stong
190b3('dul ba): gi ma bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kho'i la ba khyod kyis spyad na/ ci khyod kho bos kyang khyod la ba spyad snyam 'am/ btsun pa nye dga' de'am legs so// nye dga' de'i la ba des
190b4('dul ba): mngams kyis phyogs thams cad phyis nas bzhi ldab du ltab ste/ lags pa g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag nas lags pa g.yas pas thal lcag gi bsnam pa dang rim pa
190b5('dul ba): thams cad rdol bar gyur nas smras pa/ shes pa can lag pa gnyis rkyong shig lag pa gnyis rkyang sde nye dga' gang gis de khas bub du skyel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shug+sa
190b6('dul ba): kyis la ba lag tu phyin pa dang / des khas bub du skyel nas/ nye dga' rdogs pas bsnun te smras pa/ gcer bu baM sgres byis gtsug lag khang slan cad sas ma btal bar
190b7('dul ba): song shig/ btsun pa nye dga' gal te mgum na mchi ste sman byed kyi' tshal du mi 'chi'// de ni re shig 'byung ba yin gyis bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos
190b8('dul ba): rnams kyis bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar ni mi mdzad do// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyis 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
191a1('dul ba): 'dul ba #dgar rab na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong drug sde mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar bya/ bun 'gyed bar byed
191a2('dul ba): skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa stong par byed do// ji ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed ce na/ kun du brtson par
191a3('dul ba): byed/ yul mtshol bar byed/ shing rta rdzogs par byed/ yul du 'gro ba'i rdzas bshom par byed/ le'u pa dang gro pa dang / sna tsha dang / smyu gu dang / yi ge pa mtshol bar byed
191a4('dul ba): pa de ltar kun tu sbyor bar byed do// ji ltar rab tu sbyor bar byed ces na/ brgyas shas dang bcu shas dang bcu gnyis shes dad kyis phyir dbang po dang / gro ba dang / snag cha
191a5('dul ba): dang sta gu dang yi ge dang ba la tshol bar byed de/ de ltar rab tu spor bar byed do// ji ltar rab tu bun 'gyed par byed ce na/ nas dang 'bru snying pa/ gsar phye dang nyi sde'i phyir
191a6('dul ba): btong ba dag bzhal ba'i snod dang / bre'u chung dang phul dang gro ba dang snag tsha dang skyu gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed de/ de lta bun 'gyed par byed do// ji ltar skyed 'gyed par byed
191a7('dul ba): ce na dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs kyis phyir mu tig gi tshogs btong bar byed pa dang mu tig gi tshogs kyi phyir bai dUr+ya'i tshogs badro bar byed cing dbang po dang
191a8('dul ba): ba dang snag cha dang smyu gu dang yi ge ba tshol bar byed de/ de ltar skyed 'gyed par byed// ji ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa 'dong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon can gyi phyir mngon
191b1('dul ba): mtshan can med par gtong bar byed de/ de ltar byas pa'i phyir byas pa gtong bar byed do// ji ltar byas pa'i phyir ma byed pa gtong bar byed ce na/ gser mngon can
191b2('dul ba): gyi phyir mngon mtshan med par gtong bar byed de/ de ltar bya ba'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed do// ji ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa gtong bar byed na/ gser
191b3('dul ba): mngon mtshan can ma yin pa'i phyir mngon mtshan can ma yin pa gtong bar byed de/ de ltar ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa btong bar byed do// gzhan mu stegs can dag
191b4('dul ba): shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyongs rnams ni ma log pa spangs pa so sor ma spangs pa yin de 'di ltar mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu
191b5('dul ba): spyod par byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/ skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa
191b6('dul ba): stong par byed/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ kun tu sbyor bar byed/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ bun 'gyed par byed/
191b7('dul ba): skyed 'gyed par byed/ byas pa'i phyir ma byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir byas pa dang / ma byas pa'i phyir ma byed pa bting bar byed na/ shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams
191b8('dul ba): dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la byed brag ni ci yod/ bsams pa ni ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /
192a1('dul ba): 'dul ba sabya bar sems shes sbed par byed/ phyar ka' gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
192a2('dul ba): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di dang gleng bzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun snga ma mdzad// zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs
192a3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du smad par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag
192a4('dul ba): la smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul
192a5('dul ba): ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/ de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do// de
192a6('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs
192a7('dul ba): bas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bya ste/ zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i bzhi
192a8('dul ba): bca' bar bya 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong rnams gang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do// yang dge slong gang zhes bya
192b1('dul ba): ba ni drug sde dag gam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa du ma'o// zhes bya ba ni kun tu spyod par byed pa
192b2('dul ba): dang rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / bun 'gyed par byed pa dang / skyed 'gyed par byed pa lhag par spyod byed na'o// spangs pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs
192b3('dul ba): nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste/ de na spangs pa'i ltung byed do zhes gsungaso// de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhes na/ dge slong gi rnyed pa 'dod pas yul
192b4('dul ba): gyi tha rnyed kyi zong kun tu sbyor bar byed cing de de la shing rta dang glang dang / gla mi dang dbang po dang gro ba dang snag cha dang smyu gu dang yi ge pa la tshol bar byed de sho gam dang la can
192b5('dul ba): dang grub tsas sbyin par byed na ji rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi
192b6('dul ba): rnyed pa 'dod pas dbyig gam gser rab tu sbyor bar byed cing / de de la dbang po dang gro ba dang snag tsha dang smyu gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir
192b7('dul ba): mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la/ rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi rnyed pa 'dod pas nas dang 'bru'i bun 'gyed par
192b8('dul ba): byed cing / de de la gzhal blugs dang bre'u chung dang phul dang dbang po dang gro ba dang snag tsha dang smyu gu dang yi ge bang tshol bar byed na/ ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de
193a1('dul ba): 'du lung srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la rnyed pa bdag byed na spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi rnyed pa 'dod pas dung gi tshogs kyi phyir nor bu'i tshogs
193a2('dul ba): gtong bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i tshogs kyis phyir mu tig gi tshogs gtong bar byed pa dang / mu tig gi tshogs gi phyir bai dUr+ya'i tshegs btong bar byed cing / de de la dbang po dang /
193a3('dul ba): gro ba dang / snag tsha dang smyu gu dang yi ge pa tshol bar byed na ji srid du rnyed pa bdag gir mi byed pa de srid du nyes byas su 'gyur la rnyed pa bdag gir byed na spangs pa'i ltung byed
193a4('dul ba): du 'gyur ro// zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar mdzad do// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang sa can
193a5('dul ba): na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa rtsegs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so// de'i tshe na yangs pa can pa'i li tsa byi dag gi khang pa dag drug rtsegs dang bdun rtsigs su byed do//
193a6('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li rtsa byi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gtsug lag khang dag kyang drug rtsegs dang bdun rtsegs du byed pas de dag mthe ches pas
193a7('dul ba): ci gA rtsigs shing shing rdib nas sbyin bdag gi bsams pa/ bdag cag gson zhing 'dug ste 'tsho zhing sdod pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang dag kyang 'di ltar 'jig na shing rnams
193a8('dul ba): kyi ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag gi mkhar lan gyi rgyur dge 'dun la mi zad pa 'bul bar byed pa'o snyam nas de dag mi zad pa thogs te dge slong rnams kyi gam du dong nas
193b1('dul ba): phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dag mkhar lan gyi slad du mi zad pa 'di dag bzhes shig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang
193b2('dul ba): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis slab pa'i bzhi bca' bar mdzad pas bdag cag mi len to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
193b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir mkhar lan gyis sgyus mi zad pa blang bar bya'o// gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug ljang ni sum rtses
193b4('dul ba): du byed do// dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis dbyar khar ni nyis rtse gsu bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mi zad pa blangs nas dge 'dun gyi
193b5('dul ba): mjed dag du bcug go/ sbyin dag dag 'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci'i slad du gtsug lag gi mkhar lan mi bgyid/ kar sha pa ni dag med do// 'o na bdag cag gi khyed
193b6('dul ba): la mi zad pa dag ma phul lam/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ci kho bo cag gis mi zad pa dag zos snyam 'am/ dge 'dun gyi mdzod na 'dug go// 'phags pa dag de lha na mi
193b7('dul ba): zad par mi gyur gyi 'di ltar zad par gyur te ci bdag gis sdum pa na gnas ma mchis snyam 'am/ ci'i slad du rab tu sbyor bar mi mdzad/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa
193b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar mdzad pas bdag cag rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do// zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la
194a1('dul ba): 'du rung gsol par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyis phyir mkhar lan gyis rgyu mi zad par rab tu sbyar bar mdzad// de bzhin du
194a2('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir mi zad pa 'bul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas dang chos
194a3('dul ba): dang dge 'dun gyis phyir mi zad par rab tu sbyar bar bya zhing de las skyed gang grub pa des sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa bya'o// de ga gi drag nyid
194a4('dul ba): la byin nas de dag la 'das pa na rtsod par byed cing 'phags pa dag ci'i phyir bdag nyid kyis nor las skyed pa byung zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
194a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o// de dag gi phyug po dag la byin nas de dag la brngas pa na
194a6('dul ba): mthu dang ldan pa la rten cing cing mi bter ba dang / bla'i grwa'i mthus mi gter nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag la sbyin par mi bya'o// de dag gi
194a7('dul ba): dbul po rnams la byin nas de dag gis kyang 'jal mi nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gta' nyi rir blangs te dbang po dang bcas pa'i dam rgya'i
194a8('dul ba): gleb bu bris te sbyin par bya'o// glegs bu de la yang lo dang zla ba dang dge 'dun gyis gnas rten dang / dge skos dang / len pa po dang / rdzas dang skyes rnams kyis ming
194b1('dul ba): bri bar bya'o// gang sbyin par bya ba dge snyen dang pa can bslab pa'i bzhi lnga bzung ba la yang gta' nyi ri kho nas sbyin bya'o// las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems khrugs pa
194b2('dul ba): dang tshor ba dag ginyin pa la ltung ba med do// mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa'i spangs pa ste bcu dgu pa rdzogas+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
194b3('dul ba): byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs// de'i tshe na dge slong drug sde dag nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed gtong bar byed/ nyo bar
194b4('dul ba): byed 'tshong bar byed do// ji ltar ldan par byed ces na/ gang gi tshe ljongs su lo legs shing grong khyer du lo nyes pa de'i tshe na ljongs nas grong khyer du ldan par byed de
194b5('dul ba): de ltar len par byed do// ji ltar btong bar byed ces na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer du lo legs shing ljong su lo nyes pa de'i tshe na grong khyer du ljongs su gtong bar byed de/ de ltar
194b6('dul ba): btong bar byed de/ de ltar gtong bar byed do// ji ltar nyo bar byed ces na/ gang gi tshe rin chung ba de'i tshe na nyo bar byed de/ de ltar nyo bar byed do// ji ltar tshong bar byed ce na/
194b7('dul ba): gang gi tshe na che ba de'i tshe 'tsheng bar byed de/ de ltar tshong bar byed do// gzhan mu rtogs cen dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ma logs ma spangs pa yin te/
194b8('dul ba): 'di lngar nyo tshangs rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par byed/ gtong bar byed/ nyo bar byed tshong bar byed cing bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang nyo tshangs rnam sna tshogs byed/
195a1('dul ba): 'dul ba#/ len par byed gtong bar byed de/ nyo bar byed tshong bar byed na/ shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di bye brag ni ci yod/ bsam
195a2('dul ba): pa ni ci yod/ tha dad du bya ba ni ci yong/ su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smong bar byed byar la btang bar byed/ kha rer bar
195a3('dul ba): byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di dang gleng bzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge/
195a4('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun snga ma mdzad do// zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du smad pa mdzad pa ste/ zhes bya
195a5('dul ba): ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sang+yas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ len par
195a6('dul ba): byed/ gtong bar byed/ nye bar byed 'tsheng bar byed na bdan nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su
195a7('dul ba): mthun pa ma yin pa/ rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no// zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan
195a8('dul ba): kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ phan pa yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dus
195b1('dul ba): kha la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/ zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i bzhi
195b2('dul ba): 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spangs pa'i ltung byed do// yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni/ drug sde bdag gam gzhan
195b3('dul ba): yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o// nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa mang po'o// byed na zhes bya ba ni len par byed pa dang / stong par byed pa dang / nye bar
195b4('dul ba): byed pa dang / 'tshong bar byed pa dag lhag par spyod par byed na'o// spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyis ltung ba bshags
195b5('dul ba): par bya ste/ de spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes sungaso so// de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhes na/ dge slong gi rnyed pa 'dod pas nye bar byed/ 'tshong bar byed pa la nyes
195b6('dul ba): byas su 'gyur la 'tshong ba na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de slong gi rnyed pa 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshengs par byed na nyo bar byed pa de
195b7('dul ba): lanyes byas su 'gyur la/ 'tshong bar byed pa la lhub pa med do// dge slong gi rI pa mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na nyo bar byed pa de
195b8('dul ba): laltung ba med la/ 'tshong bar byed pa de la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi rnyed mi 'dod pas nyo bar byed cing rnyed pa mi 'dod pas 'tshong bar byed na
196a1('dul ba): 'dul ba#/ gnyi ga la ltung med do// yul gzhan gyis sbyor bas snga ma'i rgyud sbyong bar byed pa la ltung ba med do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la
196a2('dul ba): nyan thos rnams kyis bslab po'i bzhi bca' bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang brtsegs pa'i khang bzang
196a3('dul ba): na bzhug so// de'i tshe na byang lam pa'i tshang pa'i lam gyis bgrod par zhugs bdag gi gtsug lag khar rta babs mthon po dang ldan par skar khung dra ba can dang lan
196a4('dul ba): gyi chun ga/ mig dang snyid 'phrog pa mtho ris kyis them smras su gyur pa dag mthong nas dad par gyur to// de dag gtsug lag khang du dong nas dge slong rnams la 'di
196a5('dul ba): skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dag bdag gis dge 'dun la tshad sngon bgyi'o// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ chos sngon gyis yo byad dag khyer te shog shig/
196a6('dul ba): de dag gi smras pa/ bdag blo bur du lpags pa dag lags te 'di ltar bdag cag rin 'bul gyis khyed kyis 'bras dag stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab
196a7('dul ba): pa'i bzhi bca' bar mdzad pas bdag cag 'bras dag mchong ngo // zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
196a8('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi bya ba rA ltar gang gre 'dun gyi phyir chos ston byed pa de la rin gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dag ri ba kho nas sbyin par byas
196b1('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gtsug lag khang de nyid du mchod ston byed pa de la thebs dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rin
196b2('dul ba): gyis 'bras sbyin par bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad pas/ mang po dag mchod ston byed nas thams cad la sbyin pa na/ 'bras dag spyad nas spyi bungs chad par gyur pa'i
196b3('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar mi bya bar 'di ltar rin des 'bras gzhan
196b4('dul ba): dag nyo bar bya'o// 'bras snying pa dag kyis kyang so sor brdegs nas gal te srog chags med na dus su gtsengs te 'bras sar pas bang ba dag dgang bar bya'o//
196b5('dul ba): las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang sems khrugs pa dang / tshor ba bdag gi nyan pa la ltung ba med do// nyo tshang byed pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed ste nyi shu pa rdzogs s+ho// /
196b6('dul ba): sdom la// lhung bzed gnyis dang tha ga gnyis/ byin 'phrog ston zla ba chung dang / dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang / bsdus pa dang ni sngags 'dzegs so/ sangs rgyas
196b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med pa zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag thams
196b8('dul ba): cad khyim bdag mgon med ngas sbyin gyis bslab pa'i bzhi dag khyab par byas pas phyin chad gang nas kyang rnyed pa bsgrub par mi nus so// snyam nas de re snyam sems dpa' na dgal
197a1('dul ba): 'dul ba phug rgyaH/ bdun drug bcu skyed mos 'tshal du dong pa de dag nye dga'as mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te 'di dag las rnyed pa mnub na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i
197a2('dul ba): ming bzung bar mi bya'o snyam mo// drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te basbyin pa'i brkam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag gi rang gis sha dag kyang bcad cing bcad cing sbyin
197a3('dul ba): par bya'o// snyam du sems la/ gal te tshul khrims kyi gtam dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so snyam du sems so// gal te ngan song gi gtam
197a4('dul ba): dag byed na nyan pa po dag bdag cag ngan song rnam su skyes so snyam du sems pa yin pas des lhung bzed gsal ba zlum pa longs spyad par bzod pa mtshan khung gi khyer te dga' bdun
197a5('dul ba): de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dga' bdun pa cig ci nas kyang de'i sems mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i gtam byas nas de sems dang bar gyur te smras pa/ 'phag
197a6('dul ba): bci'i slab du byon/ nye dga'as smras pa/ bzhin bzang bdag la lhung bzed dgos so// 'phags pa bdag lhung bzed ma mchis te/ gal te rin gyi rnyed na bdag gis 'jal te
197a7('dul ba): gsol to// nye dga' lhung bzed chen khung nas chungs te/ de la stan nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang lhung bzed 'di yang rin gyi rnyed ma yin no// 'phags pa 'di ni rin ji tsam/ kar
197a8('dul ba): sha pa ni drug cu'o// bdag gis 'di'i rin kar sha pa ni drug bcu 'bu'o// bzhin bzang a rog kya/ de dag khyod kyi gyur cig/ sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyis rgyan dang / sems
197b1('dul ba): kyis yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyis tshegs dang / don gyis mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du snod du 'gyur gyur cig/ de bzhin du des dga' bdun drug bcu po dag re re
197b2('dul ba): yang kar sha pa ni drug bcu drug bcur sbyor du bcug ste sbyor du bcug nas song sa // dga' 'dun de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ de na dga' 'dun cig smras pa/
197b3('dul ba): shes ldan dag kho bos btsun pa nye dga' shAkya'i rigs las rab tu byung ba chos sgrogs rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa lhung bzed kyi rin du kar sha pa ni drug bcu
197b4('dul ba): phul gyis rjes su yid rang bar gyi shig/ gzhan zhig gi smras pa/ kho bos kyang phul lo// yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bos kyang phul lo// de bzhin du thams cad kyis
197b5('dul ba): kho bos kyang phul lo// kho bos kyang phu lo zhes smras nas/ de dag phan tshun blta bar brtsams ste/ shes ldan dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du dgos shes de dag gis dge
197b6('dul ba): slong zhig la dris pa/ 'phags pa dge slong gcig la lhung bzed du 'tshal/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag gcig kho na dgos so// de dag gi shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams
197b7('dul ba): ni rnyed pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dag yin no zhes pa smad brtsamaso// de ni re shig 'byung ba yin gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re shig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams
197b8('dul ba): kyis bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar mi mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyis 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe na/
198a1('dul ba): 'dul ba dan slong drug sde dag lhung bzed pa rnyed de cag stsogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyad par mi byed/ dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed nas das
198a2('dul ba): slong don nyung du bdag ci'i phyir dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed rnyed rdo cag stsogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyang spyod par mi byed/ dge slong gzhan
198a3('dul ba): dag la yang sbyin par mi byed ces smod par byed phyar ka btong bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas
198a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di dang gleng bzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun sdu ba mdzad do// zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas brtso/
198a5('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du smad pa mdzad pa ste/ zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong drug sde dag la smras pa/ dge slong
198a6('dul ba): dag khyed lhung bzed rnyed de cag stsogs par byed cing bdag nyid kying spyod par mi byed/ dge slong gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi byed pa bdan nam/ btsun pa med do// sangs rgyas
198a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gyi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no// zhes rnam
198a8('dul ba): bar smad pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs da mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu ya
198b1('dul ba): dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin no// nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba
198b2('dul ba): la bslab pa'i bzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ dge slong gi lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o// de 'das par 'chang ba na spang ba'i ltung byed do// dge
198b3('dul ba): slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so// lung bzed lhag pa zhes bya ba ni byin gyis rlabar bya ba las lhag pa'o// zhag bcu'i bar du zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan bcu'i mtha'i bar
198b4('dul ba): du'o// bca' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba'o// des las 'das par 'chang na zhes bya ba ni de las mthal bar 'tshang ba'o// spangs pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni
198b5('dul ba): dngos po de spangs nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba ste des na spangs pa'i ltung byed do// zhes gsungaso// de la lhung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhes na 'di lta ste/ dge slong
198b6('dul ba): gis chos la lhung bzed rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis rlabs par bya ba 'am/ gtang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/
198b7('dul ba): gzhan la byin par bya'o// byin gyis rlabs par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtogs par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i
198b8('dul ba): skya rang shar na/ spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// tshes la lhung bzed ma rnyed kyang tshes gnyis sam tshes gsum 'am tshes dgu 'am bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed rnyed na dge
199a1('dul ba): 'dul ba / slong des lhung bzed de zhag bcu pa de nyid kyis nang du byin gyis rlabs par bya ba'am/ gtang bar bya ba'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba'am/ gzhanas
199a2('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o/ byin gyi rlabs par mi byed dam/ rnam par rtogs par mi byed ma/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du/
199a3('dul ba): 'gyur ro// dge slong gis ches la lhung bzed cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan zhig rnyed na/ dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyis nang du snga ma byin gyis rlabs
199a4('dul ba): par bya zhing phyi ma btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par yang bya'o// yang phyi ma byin gyi rlabs par bya zhing snga ma btang bar bya ba 'am/
199a5('dul ba): rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gnan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyis rlobs par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par
199a6('dul ba): mi byed dam/ nyi ma bcu cig pa'i sbya ror shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// chos dang chos gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed
199a7('dul ba): cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyis nang du snga ma byin gyis rlabs par bya zhing phyi ma btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par rtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par
199a8('dul ba): bya'o// yang phyi ma byin gyis rlabs par bya zhing snga ma btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par rtog par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyi rlobs par mi byed dam/
199b1('dul ba): gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyiH bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong dgis
199b2('dul ba): chos la lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de nyid zhag bcu po de nyid kyis nang du byin gyi rlabs par bya ba 'am/ bting bar bya ba'am/ rnam par rdzog par
199b3('dul ba): bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyi rlabs par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed dam/ nyi ma bcu

199b5('dul ba): kyis lhung bzed gnyis rnyed na/ dge slong des lhung bzed de nyid zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis rlabs par bya ba 'am/ gtang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par rtog
199b6('dul ba): par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyis rlabs par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/
199b7('dul ba): nyi ma bcug pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi tshe la lhung bzed gnyis shig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang lhung bzed gzhan gnyis shi
199b8('dul ba): rnyed nas dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyis nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis rlabs par bya zhing phyi ma gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam rtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la
200a1('dul ba): 'dul ba#sbyin par bya'o// byin gyi rlabs par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma
200a2('dul ba): bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// tshes dang tshes gsum la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang / tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed gnyis
200a3('dul ba): shig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyis nang du snga ma gnyis byin gyis rlabs par bya zhing / phyi ma gnyis gtang bar bya ba'am/ rnam par rtag par bya ba
200a4('dul ba): 'amagazhan la sbyin par bya'o// yang phyi ma gnyis byin gyis rlabs par bya zhing snga ma gnyis btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par rtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin
200a5('dul ba): par bya'o// byin gyi rlobs par mi byed dam/ gto mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang
200a6('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gis tshes la lhung bzed mang po rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed de dag zhag bcu po de nyis kyi nang du byin gyis rlabs par bya ba
200a7('dul ba): 'am/ gtang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par rtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la byin par bya'o// byin gyis brlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog
200a8('dul ba): par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na/ nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skye reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// tshes la lhung bzed mang po ma rnyed kyang /
200b1('dul ba): chos gnyis sam gsum mam/ tshes dgu 'am/ tshes bcu tshun chad kyis lhung bzed mang po rnyed na dge slong des lhung bzed zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du byin gyis
200b2('dul ba): brlab par bya ba 'am/ btang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyis brlob par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/
200b3('dul ba): rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong gi tshes la lhung bzed mang
200b4('dul ba): po dag cig rnyed cing des tshes gnyis la yang gzhan mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyi nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag
200b5('dul ba): gtang bar bya ba 'am/ rnam par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// yang na phyi ma ga byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag btang bar bya 'am/ rnam
200b6('dul ba): par brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyis brlab par mi byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rtog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la
200b7('dul ba): byin par mi byed na nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skya rerang shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// chos dang tshes gnyis la ma rnyed kyang tshes gsum dang tshes bcu tshun chad
200b8('dul ba): kyis lhung bzed mang po dag cig rnyed na dge slong des zhag bcu po de nyid kyis nang du snga ma dag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing phyi ma dag btang bar bya ba 'am
201a1('dul ba): 'dul ba rnam par rtag par bya ba'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// yang na ngag byin gyis brlab par bya zhing snga ma dag btang bar bya ba'am/ rnam
201a2('dul ba): bar brtag par bya ba 'am/ gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// byin gyis mi brlob par byed dam/ gtong bar mi byed dam/ rnam par rdzog par mi byed dam/ gzhan la sbyin
201a3('dul ba): bar mi byed na de nyi ma bcu gcig pa'i skye reng shar na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// dge slong gi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de ma spang shing bral bar ma byas la ltung
201a4('dul ba): ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed no de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de ma spang bar gyur na de spang shing /
201a5('dul ba): bral ba ma byas la lta ba ma bshags par gzhan zhig rnyed na de yang snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong gyi lhung bzed spang bar gyur na de spang shing
201a6('dul ba): bral bar ma byas la ltung ba bshags nas gzhan zhig rnyed na de ltung ba med do// de bzhin du dge slong gis ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po des bshags shing so sor ma
201a7('dul ba): bshags na lhung bzed dam chos gos sam/ dra ba 'am/ phor bu 'am/ ska rags sam/ dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed na de yang /
201a8('dul ba): snga ma'i rgyud kyis spang bar 'gyur// lhung bzed chung ngu dang lhung bzed skyab dang lhung bzed che ba dang lhung bzed ma mchos pa 'chang ba la ltung ba med do// rab tu byung ba
201b1('dul ba): la ltos pa'i don du lhung bzed 'chang ba la thams cad du ltung ba med do// las dang po dang / smyos pa dang / sems khrugs pa dang tshor bdag gis nyan pa la ltung ba med do//
201b2('dul ba): lhung bzed 'tshang ba'i spang ba ste nyi sha gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan yod na rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med nas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
201b3('dul ba): kho na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung bzed shin tu gsal ba dbyib legs pa longs spyod par bzod pa zhig rnyed do// bsod
201b4('dul ba): snyoms pa zhig kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la bzhugs nas des bsod snyoms brgyus de srang du byin
201b5('dul ba): pa dang / spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis lhung bzed shin tu gsal ba dbyibs legs pa longs spyod par bzod pa zhig rnyed kyis
201b6('dul ba): gal te bzhad na snoms shig/ bzhin bzangs bdag la lhung bzed yod do// 'phags pa gal te dge slong gzhan 'ga' zhig lhung bzed 'tshal ba mchis na de btang du gsol
201b7('dul ba): btang bar bya'o// de nas bsod snyoms pa des mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas rgyal byed kyis tshal du song ste/ des zan zos nas lhung bzed 'khru ba na dge slong
201b8('dul ba): rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag srang ga ge mo zhig na spos tsheng gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa des lhung zeng shin tu gsal ba dbyibs legs pa longs spyod par bzod pa zhig
202a1('dul ba): 'dul ba / rnyed kyis kyid cag las gang ltung bzed 'dod pa rnam shig de dang bcang bag mi ring ba na rnyed par 'dug pa de thas nas des bsams gsung
202a2('dul ba): bzed na gcan 'ga' zhig gis gi thos nas rab tu rgyug par gyur na/ mi rung gis smang bar bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod dad pas byin pa zos nas ltung
202a3('dul ba): bzed kyi gtam las gzhan pa'i gtam 'ga' yang med mos/ des bsams pa 'jig rten 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gang ji rnyed pa de dag dang / nye dga' mtshungs pa yin na
202a4('dul ba): 'dis kyang re shig bdag smad par gyur na/ gal te dge slong gnas rten gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos par gyur na/ des rgya cher snad par gyur no// snyam nas de cang mi smra bar
202a5('dul ba): 'dug go// nye dga' dre kar te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po dang kho bo shes pas de'i phyir kho bos khyod kyis ma gshe shig/ gnas rten gal te bdag yang smra bar
202a6('dul ba): gyur na khyod kyis bdag la yang smad par bar mdzod cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo yang nye bar ma zhi ba tsam du zad kyi ci lhung gzed ma yin nam/ gnas brten snga ma nyid kyang smra bar
202a7('dul ba): mi bgyi ba lags kyis 'tshal lo// tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang re shig/ gnas brten srang che ga mo zhig na spos tshang gi khye'u zhig 'chis pa de lhung bzed shin tu
202a8('dul ba): gsal ga dbyibs legs pa long spyad par bzod pa zhig rnyed nas/ de'i mching nas gal te dge slong lhung bzed 'tshal ba 'ga' mchis na te gteng du gsol zhes mchi'o//
202b1('dul ba): de ni de brtsam du bzang do// de yang nye bar ma zhi ba tsam kho nar zad do// de nas nye dga' snam sbyar gyon te 'gros bskyed nas char ra song ba dang / spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de/
202b2('dul ba): 'gros bskyed de 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa/ dge sbyong hal po 'gros 'di lta bus 'ong ba 'dis bdag gi lhung bzed 'di phrogs 'os/
202b3('dul ba): snyam nas des lhung bzed de blangs 'jong tshe'i 'og tu bcug te bzhag pa dang / nye dga' de sbed pa'i tshe mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs lhung bzed 'di nal gyi bu
202b4('dul ba): yin nam cin de phyir sbed par byed ces des lag pa brgyad ste lhung bzed blangs nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs a ro kya sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems kyi rgyan dang / sems
202b5('dul ba): gyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod du 'gyur bar gyur cig/ 'phags pa bdag cag ni khye spogs 'tshal
202b6('dul ba): bas 'tsho ba lags pas 'di rin ma mchis par mi 'bul te/ 'di ltar rin gyi phyir 'bul lo// bzhin bzangs ci khyod drang srong gi snod 'tshong bar byed dam/
202b7('dul ba): tshig su bcad pa yang smras pa/ gal te skyes bu sa snod kyis// gser gyi snod ni thob gyur na// de yi mya ngan ci phyir bya// bslus pa med par kho bos mthong // 'ab
202b8('dul ba): pa khyod mang du gsung mod kyi 'on kyang rin ma mchis par mi 'bulo// nye dga'as smras pa/ khyod kyi lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis yi dgas lkog sba can dag gi
203a1('dul ba): 'dul ba #nang du skye bar bya dgos so zhes de de skad skyo bar byed pa na/ khyim bdag cig phyogs der 'ong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa phyag 'tshal lo// brdzun
203a2('dul ba): ba nye dga' phyag 'tshalo// nye dga' smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phyag skam po 'dis ci bya/ 'phags pa bdag la nye dga'as bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig bdag
203a3('dul ba): gis ma bsgrub lhung bzed 'di nyos te byin cig/ khyim bdag des spos tsheng gi khye'u de la smras pa/ bzhin bzang lhung bzed 'di'i rin ji tsam/ 'di dang 'di tsam//
203a4('dul ba): kho bos khyod la sbyin no// spos 'tshong gi khye'u des lhung bzed de khyim bdag de la byin nas khyim bdag des kyang de nye dga' la bu'o// nye dga'as smras pa/ a rog kya
203a5('dul ba): sbyin pa 'dis khyod sems pa'i rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na snod du 'gyur bar
203a6('dul ba): gyur cig khyim bdag de song ba dang / nye dga'as sras tshong gi khye'u de la smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis nye dga'as lhung bzed kyi rin sbyor du mdzad mi nus snyam du shes
203a7('dul ba): sam khyod kyis lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa 'dis yi dgas rba ba can dag gi nang du skye bar bya dgas so// 'phags pa ci zhig sbyor mchis khyod kyis kyang lhung bzed
203a8('dul ba): thob pa dag gis kyang rin thob kyang bzhud cig/ nye dga'as yang lhung bzed khyer du gtsug lag khang du song nas des lhung gzed de dge slong rnams la brten te smras pa/
203b1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag ltos shig/ kho bos lhung bzed ci 'dra / gnonu zhig gis smras pa/ gnas brten ci khyod la lhung bzed gzhan ma mchis sam yod do// 'o na gnas
203b2('dul ba): brten gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal du rung ngam/ dgra bo rnams kyis gre bar rkang pas man no// gnas brten la dgra bo dag ma mchis
203b3('dul ba): sam gang gi phyir kho bo'i lhung bzed gnyis pa yang mi bzod pas rje khyod kho bo'i dgra bo thub po yin no// dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag lhung bzed
203b4('dul ba): yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan tshol bar byed ces smod par byed phyar ka btong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
203b5('dul ba): 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba 'di dang / gleng bzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la ge slong gi 'dun snga ba mdzad do// zhes bya ba la stsogs
203b6('dul ba): bsnga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmad par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la stsogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
203b7('dul ba): kyis nye dga' la smras pa/ nye dag 'a khyod lhung bzed yod cing 'dog bzhin du lhung bzed bzhin tshol ba bangan nam/ brdzun pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
203b8('dul ba): kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/ tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad
204a1('dul ba): 'dul #bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnams grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gi lhung gzed/
204a2('dul ba): yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan bca' bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung gzed gzhan
204a3('dul ba): btsal bar mi bya'o// zhes bka' stsal nas/ bsod snyoms pa zhig gis lhung bzed cung zhig rdol nas des de thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang
204a4('dul ba): des phye dag rnyed nas de dag lhung bzed kyi snod kyis mnos so// 'bras chen gsher brnyed nas de dag lhung bzed kyis mnom pa dang / de nas brags pas phye dag gsher
204a5('dul ba): bar gyur te/ de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod ma rung bar gyur nas de sbrang bu dag gis yongasu bskor bar gyur pa dang / de la khye'u dang bu mo dag gis smras pa/ 'phags
204a6('dul ba): pas nor can dang tshongs dpon dang ded dpon dag bzhin du 'khor mang por 'gyur ba'i las byas pas sbrang bu dag gis yongasu bskor cig bzhud do// khyim bdag
204a7('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gis de mthong nas smras pa/ byis pa dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa la 'tho 'tshams par byed/ khyim bdag 'phags pa la 'tho tsam du ci mchis/ 2
204a8('dul ba): pas nor can dang / tshong dpon dang dad dpon dag bzhin du 'khor mang por 'gyur ba'i las bgyis pas sbrang bu dag gis yongasu bskor cing bzhud do// khyim bdag
204b1('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gis dge slong de la smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa kun tu mdzad pa la khyod ci cal col byed/ khyim ba dag 'di la cal col du
204b2('dul ba): gyur pa ci yod/ khyed kyis kho za ral mo mkhan gyi khyim dang 'jud mthun ma'i khyim dang chang ba'i khyim dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gdol ba'i khyim du zhugs pa mthong ngam/
204b3('dul ba): 'phags pa 'o na ci'i khyod byis pa dgis skor te 'phyar bar byed/ khyim bdag kho bo'i lhung bzed zag go// 'o na ci'i phyir lhung bzed gzhan mi tshol/ bcom ldan 'ad
204b4('dul ba): kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed yod cing bdog bzhin du lhung bzed gzhan btsal bar mi bya'o zhes gsungaso// 'phags pa khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di 'dra ba yod cing
204b5('dul ba): bdog pa yin nam/ zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ging lhung bzed
